oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Various record and radio excerpts
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Various recordings of performances featuring Karl And Harty (performers), the Hall Brothers (performers), and other unidentified performers.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Karl And Harty; Hall Brothers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Test tones -- Freight Train Blues ([Unidentified]) -- [Unidentified] talks (incomplete) -- Old Fashioned Love ([Unidentified]) (incomplete) -- I Can't Feel At Home In This World Anymore ([Unidentified]) (incomplete) -- East Virginia Blues ([Unidentified]) -- [Unidentified] talks (incomplete) -- Don't Dig Brother's Grave Before He Is Dead ([Unidentified]) [unconfirmed] -- [Unidentified] talks -- The Ladies Man ([Unidentified]) [unconfirmed] -- [Unidentified] talks (incomplete) -- Pass Me Not, O Gentle Savior ([Unidentified]) -- [Unidentified fiddle tune] -- Put Your Arms Around Me Honey ([Unidentified]) -- [Unidentified tune] -- Ride That Glory Train ([Unidentified]) -- Footprints In The Snow (Hall Brothers) -- I'm Sitting On Top Of The World ([Unidentified]) -- You Brought Sorrow To My Heart ([Unidentified]) -- [Unidentified fiddle tune] -- [Unidentified] talks -- [Unidentified tune] -- [Unidentified tune] -- Old Shep ([Unidentified]) -- Golden Slippers ([Unidentified]) -- Wildwood Flower ([Unidentified]) -- Blue Ridge Mountain Home ([Unidentified]) -- You Are My Sunshine ([Unidentified]) -- Alabama Jubilee ([Unidentified]) -- [Unidentified tune] -- You Are My Sunshine ([Unidentified])
